players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Alice's death is suspicious. We need to carefully investigate who might be responsible."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I am the detective and I investigated him last night."
Diana: "Charlie, if you really are the detective and investigated Bob, why are you so quick to accuse him without more evidence? We should consider all possibilities carefully."
Diana: "I understand Charlie's urgency, but accusing Bob outright without sharing investigation details makes me uneasy. Charlie, can you tell us what you found exactly?"
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso because I investigated him last night and confirmed his role. We can't afford to waste time doubting this fact."
